name: JJSB (Just Jump and Shoot Bananas)
description:
How to play:

¡Reach the button at the top of the giant tower!

¡In JJSB  (Just Jump and Shoot Bananas) you can boost your double jump by shooting downwards, you can use your gun´s momentum to achieve even higher jumps!
